model.minion



class Minion: model.living_unit.LivingUnit;
This class is inherited from a living unit and describes a minion.

immutable MinionType type;
Returns:
the minion type.

immutable double visionRange;
Returns:
the maximal range (between units' centers), at which this minion can detect other units.

immutable int damage;
Returns:
the damage of one attack.

immutable int cooldownTicks;
Returns:
the delay between attacks.

immutable int remainingActionCooldownTicks;
Returns:
the amount of ticks remaining before the next attack.
